scheme_name: Stipend Scheme for Scheduled Tribes - Poultry Training Stipend (Gujarat)
description: This scheme provides a stipend to Scheduled Tribe individuals undergoing poultry farming training to develop skills and promote self-employment.
key_features: Stipend of Rs. 4,000 per month during training
Focus on skill development for poultry farming

category_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Tribes
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Gujarat

steps: Enroll in approved poultry training program
